# [Interview #975: Brandon Sanderson's Blog: Hugo Nomination Deadline + Signed Copies of AMoL, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=975#1)

#### Brandon Sanderson

Below I have bookstore listings where you can find signed copies of
*A Memory of Light*
(and a few have
*The Emperor's Soul*
as well). They will ship to you, so give them a call!
